response.overview: Suite: INDIAN is a series of short films. It contains history, mystery and magic. Participating in the creation are artists, actors, musicians and dancers mostly based on the Six Nations Reserve. Each story chronicled expresses the challenges embodied in contemporary Native North American society. Titles may be screened separately. Chapters: 1. Prelude; 2. Mars Thunderchild Gets a Calling; 3. Kory & Mercedes; 4. The Park Was Thick in Silence; 5. Home; 6. Living With Fire / From The Ashes; 7. Dance of the Canoe Pants; 8. The Red Army is the Strongest.
response.title: Suite: INDIAN
